children.name: ItineraryService
should be defined
createItinerary
should create an itinerary with sections and blocks
should create an itinerary with default section title, empty blocks, and empty tags
should throw BadRequestException when date format is invalid
should throw BadRequestException when start date is after end date
should throw BadRequestException when no sections are provided
should throw BadRequestException when duplicate section numbers are provided
should throw NotFoundException when tags do not exist
updateItinerary
should update an itinerary with new details, tags, sections, and blocks
should update an itinerary with defaults for deleted/missing fields
should update an itinerary with defaults for missing block fields
should throw NotFoundException if itinerary does not exist
should throw ForbiddenException if user does not own the itinerary
should throw BadRequestException when date format is invalid
should throw BadRequestException when start date is after end date
should throw BadRequestException when block start time is after end time
should throw BadRequestException when no sections are provided
should throw BadRequestException when duplicate section numbers are provided
should throw NotFoundException when tags do not exist
findOneItinerary
should return itinerary when found and user has access to it
should throw NotFoundException if itinerary does not exist
should throw ForbiddenException if user is not authorized
findMyItineraries
should return paginated itineraries
should handle negative page numbers
should handle overflow page numbers
should return empty list if user has no itineraries
findMyCompletedItineraries
should return completed itineraries with locationCount
should correctly count LOCATION blocks
should return an empty array when there are no completed itineraries
markAsComplete
should mark itinerary as complete
should throw NotFoundException if itinerary does not exist
should throw ForbiddenException if user is not the owner
removeItinerary
should remove an itinerary successfully
should throw NotFoundException if itinerary does not exist
findAllTags
should return an array of tags
should return an empty array if there are no tags
inviteToItinerary
should send invitations to the provided emails
should throw NotFoundException if itinerary does not exist
should throw ForbiddenException if user is not the owner of the itinerary
acceptItineraryInvitation
should accept an itinerary invitation and link the user to the itinerary
should throw NotFoundException if the pending invitation does not exist
should throw NotFoundException if itineraryId is not found when accepting an invitation
should throw ForbiddenException if user is not authorized to accept the invitation
should throw BadRequestException if user is already a participant of the itinerary
AuthService
login
should throw UnauthorizedException if user is not found
should throw UnauthorizedException if password is invalid
should return access and refresh tokens if login is successful
refreshToken
should throw UnauthorizedException if refresh token is blacklisted
should return new access and refresh tokens if refresh token is valid
clearExpiredRefreshTokens
should delete expired refresh tokens
createUser
should throw ConflictException if user already exists and is confirmed
should throw BadRequestException if user was created recently and is not confirmed
should create a new user if user does not exist
sendVerification
should throw BadRequestException if user does not exist
should throw BadRequestException if requesting too fast
should delete the oldest ticket if there are too many
should send verification email if user exists
verify
should throw NotFoundException if verification code is not found
should throw UnauthorizedException if emails do not match
should throw UnauthorizedException if firstNames do not match
register
should throw BadRequestException if passwords do not match
should throw NotFoundException if user is not found
should update user and send registration email if verification is successful
